title: Data-Driven Instructional Design Workshop for Online English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Analysis Skills and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing smartphone-based online education in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret descriptive statistics (mean, standard deviation) derived from survey data analysis.
Learners can design a process for applying inferential statistics (one-sample t-test) to evaluate the effectiveness of English language instruction.
Learners can propose a blended (synchronous/asynchronous) online education model tailored to learner needs using a PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
